message: I'm feeling generous. Let's split it 90/10, you get the smaller share this time.
Let's turn the tables! I propose a 90/10 split, with me getting the larger share this time.  This will be a good deal for both of us as the money will be worth less in the next round.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 45/55 this time. It's a fair deal, and it'll save us both from the effects of further inflation.
